article_metadata.description: “If you don't know history, you don't know anything. You are a leaf that doesn't know it is part of a tree.” Michael Crichton When we think of HIPAA today, it's more often in terms of patient privacy, data breaches and financial penalties. In fact, HHS maintains a public list of individual data breaches that affect more than 500 [...]
